item.title: Practical Tools for Matplotlib Colormaps
item.description: Choosing a good colormap is hard. Jet always looks pretty but just try printing in black & white and everything you thought you knew about your data changes. I have several resources I use when picking a good colormap. Click the Read more to find out more.
item.dc:creator: Dylan Gregersen

item.title: Supermongo to Python
item.description: A tutorial for switching from Supermongo to Python

item.title: Python 3 All the Things!
item.description: I just gave a Python3 talk to SLCPython Meetup Here are some links and resources to find out more about all the hype
